entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have discovered the name of the organization that uses s single red circle as their calling card: the Chirq Council. It has become clear that they are the ones behind most of the recent criminal activity on Corellia, including the assassination of the mayor of Kor Vella as well as the attempt to frame the Corellian Diktat of smuggling spice.
entries.journal_entry_description: The mayor of Kor Vella has been murdered! This time the assassination was successful. Was the previous suspect, Hershel Sheridan, truly part of the original attack, or merely an attempt to hide the true culprits?
entries.journal_entry_title: CorSec Case Files: The Unlucky Mayor
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Return to the scene of Hershel Sheridan's demise and make certain you didn't overlook anything.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Upon examination of Hershel's blaster, you discover that it doesn't have a power cell. This discovery means that either someone removed the power cell after Hershel killed himself, or that Hershel was killed by someone using a different blaster. Hershel's death is looking a lot less like a suicide.
entries.task01_message_box_text: Upon examination of Hershel's blaster, you discover that it doesn't have a power cell. This discovery means that either someone removed the power cell after Hershel killed himself, or that Hershel was killed by someone using a different blaster. Hershel's death is looking a lot less like a suicide. Your only clue, so far, is the card with a single red circle in Hershel's hand.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: One of the CorSec agents at the Mayor's office found a suspicious package. Go examine it. Maybe you'll find a clue of some sort. The package was left for you in the front room.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Examine the Package in the Mayor's Front Room
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The package appears to be a few months old, based on the delivery date. Inside you find a datadisk as well as a note. The disk contains credits that were given to the mayor, but that he never transferred into his account. The note promises future payments if the mayor does as he is told, but also threatens him if he disobeys. The note is signed with a single red circle.
entries.task03_message_box_text: The package appears to be a few months old, based on the delivery date. Inside you find a datadisk as well as a note. The disk contains credits that were given to the mayor, but that he never transferred into his account. The note promises future payments if the mayor does as he is told, but also threatens him if he disobeys. The note is signed with a single red circle.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Your only significant clue is the single red circle that has appeared in connection with many of the crimes you've investigated. It would seem that the same person is involved with the murder of the mayor and of Hershel Sheridan as well as the smuggling of ryll into Kor Vella. Speak with Lt. Cope and find out if CorSec has uncovered any information about this red circle.
entries.task05_entrance_waypoint_name: Entrance to the Ryll Smugglers' Bunker
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: In order to access the mainframe at the base that Lt. Cope discovered, you'll need an access code. Lt. Cope thinks that you can find one at the ryll smuggler bunker. Go to the lower level of the bunker, defeat the ryll smuggler underboss, and get his access code.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Get an Access Code from the Ryll Smuggler Underboss
entries.task05_waypoint_name: Entrance to the Ryll Smugglers' Bunker
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Proceed to the red circle base. Once there, defeat some of the guards and access their central computer. Look for any information about who the red circle organization truly is.
entries.task06_task_display_string_1: Download Information on the Red Circle Organization from the Mainframe
entries.task10_entrance_waypoint_name: Entrance to the Red Circle Bunker
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Defeat the three leaders of the Kor Vella chapter of the Chirq Council: Annor Fash, Vella Corse, and Vora Anjek.
entries.task10_journal_entry_title: Defeat the 3 Leaders of the Kor Vella Chirq Council
entries.task10_waypoint_name: Entrance to the Red Circle Bunker
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: Defeat some of the guards in the base to help cover your tracks.
entries.task13_item_name: You have logged onto the mainframe
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: Log onto the mainframe at the red circle base and download any information you can find.
entries.task14_journal_entry_description: From the mainframe, you learn that a red circle is the sign of an organization that calls themselves the Chirq Council. They are attempting to assert their power on Corellia and take control of all criminal activity on the planet. The Galactic Civil War provides a distraction for the Corellian Security Forces which makes the timing perfect for the Chirq Council. The Chirq Council primarily operates out of Doaba Guerfel, but has cells in play throughout the planet. The Kor Vella chapter is run locally by three people: Annor Fash, Vella Corse, and Vora Anjek.
entries.task14_message_box_text: From the mainframe, you learn that a red circle is the sign of an organization that calls themselves the Chirq Council. They are attempting to assert their power on Corellia and take control of all criminal activity on the planet. The Galactic Civil War provides a distraction for the Corellian Security Forces which makes the timing perfect for the Chirq Council. The Chirq Council primarily operates out of Doaba Guerfel, but has cells in play throughout the planet. The Kor Vella chapter is run locally by three people: Annor Fash, Vella Corse, and Vora Anjek.
